QAData.answer: Burnley vs Watford on Sat, 05 Feb 2022 18:00:00 GMT ended in a 0–0 tie.

funFacts.fallback: Ashley Westwood completed the most passes (40) in the match.
Joshua King is the most accurate passer (91%) in the match.
James Tarkowski won the most duels (17) in the match.
Maxwel Cornet has the least touches (34) of any outfield player.
Hassane Kamara was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.5.
Dwight McNeil completed the most dribbles (5) in the match.
